title: Worcester police seek help identifying suspects involved in unarmed robberies targeting elderly

bullets: Crime Police shared photos of the suspects and their vehicles seeking the public’s help identifying and locating them.

title: Manchester-by-the-Sea police, firefighters rescue woman stuck in swamp
author: Sana Muneer
bullets: Local News Photos shared by the fire department show first responders wading through waist-deep water toward the woman.
Police and firefighters in Manchester-by-the-Sea located a person who was got stuck in a swampy area in the woods off Route 128.

Manchester-by-the-Sea Fire Department By Sana Muneer November 13, 2025 | 6:43 PM 1 minute to read Manchester-by-the-Sea police and firefighters on Wednesday rescued a woman stuck in a swampy area in the woods off Route 128, officials said.

title: In Canada, Wu helps chop down Boston’s Christmas tree
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News Mayor Michelle Wu spent three days in Nova Scotia, saying she wanted to affirm Boston's relationship with Canada amid antagonism from the Trump administration.

title: Patriots to debut new ‘Rivalries’ jerseys Thursday night
author: Aidan Buchanan
bullets: New England Patriots "Rugged, weathered, and worn in, like the coastline after a gale.

" Patriots will debut their "Rivalry" jerseys Thursday night against the Jets (New England Patriots) New England Patriots A nor’easter will be coming to Foxborough Thursday night, as the Patriots take on the Jets.
Looking to improve to 9-2, New England will debut their new “Rivalries” jerseys for this divisional matchup.
